input: 3. Given a convex quadrilateral $ABCD$ with area $P$. We extend side $AB$ beyond $B$ to $A_1$ such that $\overline{AB}=\overline{BA_1}$, then $BC$ beyond $C$ to $B_1$ such that $\overline{BC}=\overline{CB_1}$, then $CD$ beyond $D$ to $C_1$ so that $\overline{CD}=\overline{DC_1}$, and $DA$ beyond $A$ to $D_1$ such that $\overline{DA}=\overline{AD_1}$. What is the area of quadrilateral $A_1B_1C_1D_1$?
